Description: Fragment of handle from a Thasian pottery transport amphora. Clay near fine, micaceous light brown. Rectangular stamp at top of handle with Greek inscription and mouse symbol.
Curator's comments: Name Krinomenes. Petrie diary, 1884-1885 (EES Archive XVII 47), p. 51, 13
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (JB.0030)
